content: CFS-T EX cable modules Modules to seal cables/pipes within transit frames in potentially explosive atmospheres ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Cable transit frames and penetration sealing systems- - ### FEATURES:Features Simplified inventory management – only 7 different modules are needed to cover all cable diameters from 3 to 99 mm Versatile adapter modules for quicker, easier accommodation of each cable diameter Time-saving installation thanks to module interlinking, especially where cables run vertically through deck/floor penetrations Color-coded adapter system to make inspection easier and more reliable Cable modules up to size 40 mm are supplied as one perforated block and can be easily separated for individual use. Applications For use in potentially explosive atmospheres Industries affected by the ATEX directive, such as the petrochemical and chemical industries Oil and gas platforms which are not covered by the IMO resolution For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Temperature resistance range: -40 - 167 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Technical Data | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 167 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) ### ITEMS- 2042700 - Cable module CFS-T EX 15/0+3-9 - Package Size 64 pc - 2042701 - Cable module CFS-T EX 20/0+5-12 - Package Size 36 pc - 2042702 - Cable module CFS-T EX 30/0+13-23 - Package Size 16 pc - 2042703 - Cable module CFS-T EX 40/0+23-33 - Package Size 9 pc - 2042704 - Cable module CFS-T EX 60/0+34-51 - Package Size 4 pc
